shortDescription: Interactive novel brought to life with a pop-up book controller telling the coming-of-age story of a Chinese-American girl named Aspen as she navigates her self of identity amidst the weight of external pressures, labels, and expectations. Featured in alt.ctrl.GDC at the Game Developer's Conference 2023.
resumeBullets: Collaborated regularly with the creative director and 4+ designers to design and engineer puzzles that furthered the story's central themes on self-labels, image, and reconciliation for an alternative controller.
Innovated tactile puzzle mechanics in C and C# that received external sensor input detecting physical interactions including touch, dial turns, and item placement.
